    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Queasy Lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1293)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This bull's-eye lantern is wrapped in decrepit leather skin. It constantly emits light in a 60-foot cone (and dim light in the next 60 feet). You can close or open internal shutters with an Interact action to block or reveal the light.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You slide in a magical lens that causes the lantern to emit a pale green light and then aim the lantern. All creatures in the lantern's 60-foot cone of bright light (but not those in the dim light), must attempt a DC 23 Fortitude save. On a failure, a creature becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 2 on a critical failure). The light then reverts to normal as the lens slides out of place.
